text: As far as I can tell Python, up through 2.5, only supports hexadecimal & octal literals.
I did find some discussions about adding binary to future versions but nothing definite.
I am pretty sure this is one of the things due to change in Python 3.0 with perhaps bin() to go with hex() and oct().
